AC1.rationale: All samples are Python code files that require pytest test generation

AC2.rationale: Sample files are simple standalone code (no Clean Architecture layers). AC2 will be tested with real project files.

AC3.rationale: All samples require test execution and coverage reporting

AC4.rationale: All samples will be processed using local Qwen model (no external APIs)

AC5.rationale: All samples are simple enough to achieve ≥80% coverage with proper test generation

recommendations.additional_notes: Sample files are well-designed and cover appropriate complexity levels. They are suitable for production validation. AC2 (Clean Architecture validation) should be tested separately with real project files from src/domain/test_agent/ or src/application/test_agent/.

next_steps.developer_action: Implement verification scripts that run Test Agent against all 4 sample files
verification_script_requirements: Run Test Agent CLI for each sample file
Exit with code 0 if all pass, 1 if any fail
